item.title: Hachyderm or Fosstodon
item.author: prma.dev@protonmail.com (Perma)
item.description: Intro Ever since I have moved to the mastodon platform after “the great twitter migration”. I was curious about two main instances. One being Fosstodon, an instance oriented around FOSSÂ 1, another being Hachyderm, an instance that introduces itself as social media for technical professionals. Eventualy, I decided to go with Fosstodon, as I liked what I was seeing there more. But I couldn’t put my finger on what it was that I liked more about Fosstodon, even though many of my favorite people resided on Hachyderm, the instance owner of the Hachyderm herself, being one examples.
